attributes.action: Resort back to normal opening hours for pubs and clubs
attributes.additional_details: To help businesses in the hospitality trade to continue to trade and avoid mass closures and redundancies
attributes.background: Revoke the restrictions put on pubs and clubs trading hours.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Repeal Covid-19 Restrictions on opening hours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551634

The government to allow the opening of nightclubs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331625
